SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

fr.exanpe.t5.lib.annotation
Annotation Type Authorize

@Target(value={METHOD,TYPE})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Documented
public @interface Authorize

Interface used to restrict a page's method invocation.
Simply annotate your method or class with \@Authorize and the restriction will be applied depending on the current user authorities.
Note that on authorization failure, an AuthorizeException will be thrown. Catch it to display a custom error page.

Since:
1.2
Author:
jmaupoux
See Also:
AuthorizeException

Optional Element Summary
 String[] all
          All of these authorizations are required to grant access
 String[] any
          Any of these authorizations grant access
 String[] not
          None of these authorizations grant access
 

any

public abstract String[] any
Any of these authorizations grant access

Default:
{}

all

public abstract String[] all
All of these authorizations are required to grant access

Default:
{}

not

public abstract String[] not
None of these authorizations grant access

Default:
{}
